## ğŸ› Issue Type

- [ ] **Inaccurate Information**: The docs say X but it actually works like Y

- [ ] **Typos/Grammar**: Spelling, grammar, or formatting issues
- [ ] **Broken Links**: Links that don't work or go to wrong pages
